MAVI.IS.long_name: Mavi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
MAVI.IS.summary: Mavi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the wholesale and retail sale of ready-to-wear denim apparel for men, women, and children. The company offers knit and woven shirts, T-shirts, sweaters, jackets, skirts, dresses, accessories, and denim bottoms. It operates 314 retail stores, 67 franchised stores, and 500 wholesale doors in Turkey; 1 retail store and 1,650 wholesale doors in Europe; 1,350 wholesale doors in the United States; 4 retail stores and 1,300 wholesale doors in Canada; 19 retail stores, 15 franchised stores, and 139 wholesale doors in Russia; and 20 franchise stores and 32 wholesale doors internationally, as well as e-commerce platforms. Mavi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1991 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
